docs.text: mkdocs-material-starterkit ¶ StarterKit of MkDocs with Material Design theme Generator: MkDocs Theme : Material for MkDocs Demo : https://syon.github.io/mkdocs-material-starterkit/ Docker is Recomended This starter-kit uses Docker to avoid installing Python. It makes your computer clean. docs.title: How to automate deploying via Wercker

docs.text: Mac ¶ syon/mkdocs-material-starterkit Install ¶ Download ZIP Install Docker for Mac | Docker Documentation $ docker pull squidfunk/mkdocs-material Wercker CLI Run ¶ $ wercker dev --expose-ports http://0.0.0.0:8000 Deploy ¶ GitHub Pages ¶ $ docker run --rm -it -p 8000 :8000 -v ${ PWD } :/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material gh-deploy Other Static Sites ¶ $ wercker build Upload site directory as root
docs.title: Mac

docs.text: Download ZIP Install Docker for Mac | Docker Documentation $ docker pull squidfunk/mkdocs-material Wercker CLI
docs.title: Install

docs.text: $ wercker build Upload site directory as root
docs.title: Other Static Sites

docs.text: Windows ¶ syon/mkdocs-material-starterkit Docker requires Windows 10 Pro Docker for Windows requires 64bit Windows 10 Pro with Hyper-V available. See What to know before you install for a full list of prerequisites. Install ¶ Download ZIP Install Docker for Windows | Docker Documentation windows/docker-pull.bat Run ¶ windows/mkdocs-serve.bat http://0.0.0.0:8000 Deploy ¶ GitHub Pages ¶ windows/mkdocs-gh-deploy.bat Other Static Sites ¶ windows/mkdocs-build.bat Upload site folder as root
